revised_title: Synthesis and Properties of Menaphtylamine and its Derivatives
tldr: The author describes the transformation of aromatic monamines into carbon-rich acids, focusing on the synthesis and properties of menaphtylamine. The process involves the use of nascent hydrogen to attack thiocompounds, resulting in the formation of menaphtylamine. The author also discusses the properties of menaphtylamine and its derivatives, as well as the potential for further research into sulfur compounds.
